message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $165. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $155. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're trying to get closer to the price you want, Bob! I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer it to you for $160. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $157.50. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm willing to meet you halfway again, Bob! I can offer it to you for $158. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I was thinking more along the lines of $157. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I can offer it to you for $159. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate all the offers you've made, Alice. I'm willing to pay $156 for the product. This is my best and final offer. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
